Name: Linelith
About the game: Linelith is a line-drawing puzzle game set on a colorful, serene alien asteroid. Solve puzzles embedded in rocks and crystals by drawing lines in intricate patterns, conforming to their shape and their symbols. As you progress, discover a few clever twists on these mechanics that shake up the puzzles and make you look at things in a different way. Chill out and go at your own pace in this short and sweet puzzle experience. Features Over 70 puzzles, on a gentle difficulty curve, ranging from easy to challenging Every puzzle can be freely skipped to return to later A soothing, serene music track, and juicy sound design by Brendan Julian A versatile line-drawing mechanic which is intuitive but deep, with several twists Linelith is part of the CosmOS 9 bundle, a set of 9 puzzle games discovered on a mysterious video game console drifting in outer space.
Meta Title: Linelith: May 19, 2022, Patrick Traynor and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Linelith? Check out the release date (May 19, 2022), developer insights from Patrick Traynor, and a complete game summary.
